alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:54PM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the second Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet, locally up to 28 inches Pine Valley and Tushar Mountains. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Storm Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the second Winter Storm Warning, from 5 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected through most southern mountain routes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
